cards.title: Cyberknight
powers: Cyberknight deals a target 2 Energy damage. You may discard up to 5 cards. For each card discarded this way, Cyberknight deals a target 1 Energy damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a hero target. Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to that target by 1.
Select a hero target. The next damage dealt by that target is irreducible and increased by 1.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Weapons live!  Keep your mind focused on the objectives!

cards.title: Plate Reinforcement

flavorQuotes.text: Techno-armor? Expensive. Safety? Priceless.

cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to Cyberknight by 1.

cards.title: Thunderstorm Conduit

flavorQuotes.text: Ah! I see someone eager to take the brunt of the storm!

cards.body: When Cyberknight would be dealt damage by a target other than herself, she may deal that target 4 Lightning damage, then deal each other non-hero target 2 Lightning damage. If Cyberknight deals damage this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Burst Energizer

flavorQuotes.text: I'd keep up easier if you didn't expend the emergency units with a hair-trigger temper...

cards.body: When Cyberknight would be dealt damage by a target other than herself, she may use a power, and if that power deals damage, increase it by 3. If she uses a power this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Snare-Clutch Mount

flavorQuotes.text: Ah! Robot Snake!

cards.body: When Cyberknight would be dealt damage by a target other than herself, you may reduce damage dealt to Cyberknight by that target by 2 and reidrect damage dealt by that target to Cyberknight until the start of your next turn. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Counter-Shield Projector

flavorQuotes.text: Stand behind me!

cards.body: When Cyberknight would be dealt damage by a target other than herself, you may reduce damage dealt to other hero targets by 2 until the start of your next turn. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Medical Assistant Unit

flavorQuotes.text: With how much you get roughed up, test this new tool. Apply to new injuries immediately, or else it loses potency.

cards.body: When Cyberknight would be dealt damage by a target other than herself, Cyberknight may regain 5 HP. If Cyberknight regains any HP this way, each other hero target regains 2 HP, then destroy this card.

cards.title: Crossblade Missiles

flavorQuotes.text: Come on, give me all you've got. You'll have a blast.

cards.body: When Cyberknight would be dealt damage by a target other than herself, she may deal that target 2 Fire damage X times, where X is the amount of damage Cyberknight would be dealt. If Cyberknight deals damage this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Quake Lance

flavorQuotes.text: Tremors, personally delivered...I'm not jealous.

cards.powers: Cyberknight may deal herself 1 irreducible Lightning damage. If she takes damage this way, Cyberknight deals a target 4 irreducible Melee damage. Otherwise, Cyberknight deals a target 3 Melee damage.

cards.title: Polyburst Glaive

flavorQuotes.text: The shaft extender wouldn't die on you if you didn't eat its power for a quick surge!

cards.powers: Cyberknight deals a target 2 Melee damage and 2 damage of a type of your choice. Cyberknight may deal herself 1 irreducible Lightning damage. If she takes damage this way, reduce the next damage dealt to Cyberknight by 4.

cards.title: Suppression Rifle

flavorQuotes.text: You will stand down! It happens with or without compliance!

cards.powers: Cyberknight deals up to three targets 1 Projectile damage each. Cyberknight may deal herself 1 irreducible Lightning damage. If she takes damage this way, prevent the next damage dealt by non-hero targets dealt damage this way.

cards.title: Heroic Intervention

flavorQuotes.text: Nobody falls on my watch!

cards.body: Whenever a Hero target would be dealt damage by a non-hero card, you may redirect that damage to Cyberknight.

cards.title: Pulse Displacer

flavorQuotes.text: Just you, me, and a decent sense of honor.

body: Environment cards can not be played.
Hero targets are immune to damage from environment cards.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Affinity Catalyst

flavorQuotes.text: What on Earth made you think a cattleprod on a lightning elemental was smart?!

cards.body: When Cyberknight is dealt Lightning damage, you may either draw a card or play a card.

cards.title: Armed And Armored

flavorQuotes.text: Never leave unprepared for the fight. Never come unprepared to feel the fight.

body: Search your deck for one Arsenal card and one Armor card. Put one into play and the other into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

cards.title: Repair Armor

flavorQuotes.text: [placeholder]

cards.powers: Discard a card. If you do, put an Armor from your trash into play.

flavorQuotes.text: [placeholder]

cards.title: Overclocked Arsenal

flavorQuotes.text: [placeholder]

body: You may use an additional power during your power phase.
At the start of your turn, Cyberknight may deal herself 1 irreducible Lightning damage. If she took no damage this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Clearing The Field

flavorQuotes.text: It's just us now, Igsazill! No distractions.

cards.body: Destroy up to two environment cards.

cards.title: Bounty Hunt

flavorQuotes.text: Immoral!? I do my work and pay my bills!

cards.body: When a villain target is reduced to 2 HP or less, destroy it, then you may draw a card.

cards.title: Priority Target

flavorQuotes.text: [placeholder]

body: When this card enters play, place it next to a target.
When the target next to this card is destroyed, each player may draw a card.
When any target is destroyed, destroy this card.

cards.title: Sacrifice In Empowerment

flavorQuotes.text: [placeholder]

body: Increase damage dealt to and by Cyberknight by 2.
You may use an extra power during your power phase.
At the end of your next turn, Cyberknight deals herself 3 Infernal damage, then destroy this card.
